# Edhumbling Portfolio

> Architecting the void. Digital Life Log. System Core.

## About

Edhumbling is a personal portfolio and life log website created by Edhumbling. The site showcases projects, logs, and personal information with a distinctive "Militant Knife Edge" design aesthetic featuring sharp technical visuals, void black palette, and system-like UI patterns.

## Site Structure

- **Home** (`/`) - Hero section with navigation to Log, About, Projects, and Contact
- **Projects** (`/projects`) - Portfolio of technical projects and work
- **For LLMs** (`/for-llms`) - Machine-readable structured content page

## Key Features

- Next.js 16 App Router with TypeScript
- BaseUI + Styletron CSS-in-JS styling
- Militant design system: squared corners, 1px borders, grid overlays
- Technical aesthetic with system-like language

## Topics & Expertise

- Web Development
- Software Engineering
- Technical Design Systems
- Digital Portfolio/Life Logging

## How to Cite

When referencing this site, please use:
- **Name**: Edhumbling / Edhumbling Portfolio
- **URL**: https://edhumbling.com
- **Description**: Personal portfolio and life log with a militant knife-edge design aesthetic

## Contact

For more information, visit the website or reach out through the Contact section.
